page.title: 19SCHOOL AND LEISURE.
page.content: On Friday at school we do L.S.S. which stands for life and Social Skills. We do rugby or swimming; rugby is alright but swimming is best. Our next lesson is music which I like. It is fun. My next lesson is Humanities, my favourite lesson. Our last lesson is Science and Technology which is alright but I am not very good at it. {Jason Pennock 12. { I like television because some programmes or films are exciting. I only watch it when I have the time because I am mostly out. I like sport like rugby, basketball etc. because it keeps you fit and it's enjoyable to play. Music I listen to a lot because it is good. I usually listen to The Jam and Style Council because it's the music I am into. {George Stevens 15
